protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for a C-C type chemokine. Binds to eotaxin, eotaxin-3, MCP-3, MCP-4, RANTES and MIP-1 delta. Subsequently transduces a signal by increasing the intracellular calcium ions level. Alternative coreceptor with CD4 for HIV-1 infection

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
